title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
OB: When right-clicking in the Java perspective, the "Build" option is always enabled in the context sensitive popup menu.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there are buildable resources in the workspace.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click anywhere in the workspace.
3. Observe that the "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu is always enabled, even when there are no buildable resources present.
